name: Christmas Stories: Alice's Adventures
storyline: You’re enjoying your Christmas when the White Rabbit from Wonderland comes to you for help! The Christmas spirit is vanishing all over the world, but why? Come along for a fun adventure and return joy to the world by restoring harmony to the characters of Wonderland!
summary: Meet familiar characters in new places and return joy to the world in Christmas Stories: Alice's Adventures, an enchanting hidden-object puzzle adventure game!

videos.name: Launch Trailer
